name: Space Ninja (mhorth)
description:
Intro

What ever happened to that Fruit Ninja guy? His skill set made him the perfect fit to defend the Earth from an asteroid shower. Guide his blade to clear the skies and protect the world as long as you can!

Controls

Esc or "P" to pause, otherwise it's just click and drag. There is a low poly toggle in the options menu if necessary.

Extra Notes

Quite a few players have reported issues when playing the web version on a laptop. I expect it has to do with using integrated graphics on a CPU instead of a dedicated GPU. It is a game with 3D models after all (and a lot of them!). If you have framerate issues playing the web version, please try downloading it instead.
